conversation.html: @MadLittleMods i spoke too soon, i think. the GitHub webhook was delivering events for all repositories in the org, but it seems like as of a couple of days ago, it seems to have stopped. i could recreate the webhook, but i've held off doing that in case there's anything on your end you'd want to debug

conversation.html:
@io7m Does GitHub still say it is delivering the events since it has stopped?

Here are some other reports: https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitter/webapp/issues/2084#github-integration-activity-has-stopped-working-for-some-people
